title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients:
400g spaghetti
200g pancetta
4 large eggs
100g Parmesan cheese
Freshly ground black pepper
instructions:
Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water
Fry the pancetta until crispy
Whisk eggs and cheese in a bowl
Mix everything together off the heat

title: Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients:
Chicken breast
Mixed vegetables
Soy sauce
Ginger
Garlic
instructions:
Cut chicken into pieces
Stir fry vegetables
Add chicken and sauce
Cook until done
